channel.title: Changing Combat Formulars + Weapon Bonuses (PI)
channel.description: how can i adjust the defence bonuses of items or the natural combat formulars because it seems that the max hit with a whip is 40 and thats with overloads + maxed strength bonus and also other items such as chaotic maul and ags + dharoks hit low for a max hit.

item.title: Changing Combat Formulars + Weapon Bonuses (PI)
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

could you post the layout for items.cfg ? like

Itemid Itemname Description SlashdefBonus

like that for example if you know it please.

Read full topic
